round_best: Develop a self-adaptive artificial intelligence system that dynamically adjusts cooling parameters in real-time based on predictive analytics and machine learning, using both external temperature forecasts and internal workload predictions. This AI system would be integrated with IoT sensors strategically placed throughout the data center to continuously monitor heat output at various points, enabling a fine-grained control of cooling resources. This approach maximizes energy efficiency by adapting cooling efforts to anticipated needs rather than reacting to existing conditions, significantly reducing energy consumption and optimizing operational costs.
